privacyPolicy.title: Introduction
privacyPolicy.content:
This Privacy Policy ("Policy") explains how FirgoMart, operated and owned by FirgoMart 24Logistics Private Limited, an Indian private limited company incorporated under the Companies Act, 2013 and having its principal place of business in India ("Company", "FirgoMart", "we", "us", or "our"), collects, uses, processes, stores, shares, transfers, and protects information of users across India and internationally.

FirgoMart operates a global e-commerce platform that enables buyers and sellers worldwide to transact, subject to applicable laws. This Policy applies to all users accessing the FirgoMart mobile application, website, seller portals, dashboards, APIs, and related digital infrastructure (collectively, the "Platform").

By accessing or using the Platform, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agreed to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.

privacyPolicy.title: 1. Scope and Applicability
privacyPolicy.content: This Policy applies to buyers located in India and outside India, Indian and international sellers, manufacturers and suppliers, logistics, payment and service partners, and visitors accessing the Platform globally. The Policy governs personal and business information processed when FirgoMart operates as a marketplace facilitator or as a direct seller of goods globally.

privacyPolicy.title: 2. Information We Collect
privacyPolicy.content: FirgoMart collects information from buyers, sellers, suppliers, and partners as necessary for operating the Platform and complying with applicable laws.

privacyPolicy.title: 2.1 Buyer Information (Global Buyers)
privacyPolicy.content: FirgoMart may collect full name, email address, contact number, shipping and billing addresses (domestic and international), order history, transaction records, communications, and customer support interactions.

privacyPolicy.title: 2.2 Seller and Supplier Information (Indian and International)
privacyPolicy.content: FirgoMart may collect legal name, business name, registered address, government-issued identification and business registration documents, tax identifiers such as GST, VAT, EIN or equivalent where applicable, bank account and settlement details, and export, customs, and regulatory documentation.

privacyPolicy.title: 2.3 Payment Information
privacyPolicy.content: FirgoMart does not store card numbers, UPI credentials, or banking passwords. All payments are processed through authorised payment service providers in accordance with applicable regulations.

privacyPolicy.title: 2.4 Technical and Usage Information
privacyPolicy.content: FirgoMart may automatically collect IP address, device identifiers, browser type, operating system, app version, cookies, log files, analytics data, and usage behaviour on the Platform.

privacyPolicy.title: 3. Purpose of Collection and Use
privacyPolicy.content: Information is collected and processed for onboarding, verification and account management, facilitating domestic and international transactions, order processing, payments, shipping and delivery, customs and regulatory compliance, fraud prevention and security, customer support, dispute resolution and grievance handling, analytics, audits, and improvement of Platform services.

privacyPolicy.title: 4. Lawful Basis for Processing
privacyPolicy.content: Information is processed based on one or more lawful grounds including user consent, performance of contractual obligations, compliance with legal and regulatory requirements, and legitimate business interests of FirgoMart as a global e-commerce operator.

privacyPolicy.title: 5. Global Data Sharing and Disclosure
privacyPolicy.content: Information may be shared with payment gateways and financial institutions, logistics and fulfilment partners, customs authorities, tax departments and regulators, banks, insurers, auditors and professional advisers, and technology and cloud service providers. All disclosures are made on a need-to-know basis and subject to confidentiality obligations.

privacyPolicy.title: 6. Cross-Border Data Transfers
privacyPolicy.content: To support global operations, information may be transferred to or processed in countries outside India. Such transfers are undertaken with appropriate contractual and technical safeguards and in compliance with applicable data protection laws.

privacyPolicy.title: 7. Data Retention
privacyPolicy.content: Information is retained only for as long as necessary to fulfil the purposes described in this Policy, comply with legal, tax, accounting, and regulatory requirements, and resolve disputes or enforce agreements, after which data is securely deleted, anonymised, or archived as permitted by law.

privacyPolicy.title: 8. Data Security Measures
privacyPolicy.content: FirgoMart implements reasonable administrative, technical, and organisational measures to protect information against unauthorised access, loss, misuse, alteration, or disclosure. However, no system can guarantee absolute security.

privacyPolicy.title: 9. User Rights (Global Users)
privacyPolicy.content: Subject to applicable law, users may request access to their information, correction or updating of inaccurate data, deletion or restriction of processing where legally permitted, and withdrawal of consent where applicable. Requests may be made through official support or grievance channels.

privacyPolicy.title: 10. Third-Party Services
privacyPolicy.content: The Platform may include links to or integrations with third-party services. FirgoMart is not responsible for the privacy practices of such third parties, and users should review their respective privacy policies.

privacyPolicy.title: 11. Children’s Privacy
privacyPolicy.content: The Platform is not intended for individuals below the age permitted under applicable law. FirgoMart does not knowingly collect information from such individuals and will delete such data upon becoming aware.

privacyPolicy.title: 12. Updates to this Policy
privacyPolicy.content: FirgoMart may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes shall become effective upon publication on the Platform.

privacyPolicy.title: 13. GDPR & GLOBAL DATA PROTECTION COMPLIANCE
privacyPolicy.content:
FirgoMart is committed to complying with the General Data Protection Regulation (EU) 2016/679 ("GDPR") and other applicable global data protection laws for users located in the European Union (EU), European Economic Area (EEA), the United Kingdom, and other jurisdictions with comparable privacy frameworks.

For the purposes of GDPR:

Data Controller: FirgoMart 24Logistics Private Limited

Data Subject: Any identified or identifiable natural person whose personal data is processed

FirgoMart processes personal data in accordance with the principles set out under Article 5 of the GDPR, including lawfulness, fairness, transparency, purpose limitation, data minimisation, accuracy, storage limitation, integrity, and confidentiality.

privacyPolicy.title: 14. LAWFUL BASIS FOR PROCESSING (GDPR – ARTICLE 6)
privacyPolicy.content: Personal data is processed by FirgoMart on one or more lawful bases as defined under Article 6(1) of the GDPR, including:
points: Consent of the data subject
Performance of a contract, including order processing, payments, delivery, and customer support
Compliance with legal obligations under applicable Indian and international laws
Legitimate business interests of FirgoMart, including fraud prevention, platform security, analytics, audits, and service improvement

privacyPolicy.content: Where consent is relied upon, it is obtained and recorded in accordance with Article 7 of the GDPR.

privacyPolicy.title: 15. DATA SUBJECT RIGHTS (GDPR – ARTICLES 12 TO 23)
privacyPolicy.content: Subject to applicable law, data subjects are entitled to exercise the following rights:
points: Right of Access – Article 15
Right to Rectification – Article 16
Right to Erasure (Right to be Forgotten) – Article 17
Right to Restriction of Processing – Article 18
Right to Data Portability – Article 20
Right to Object – Article 21
Rights relating to Automated Decision-Making and Profiling – Article 22

privacyPolicy.content: Requests may be submitted using the contact details provided in this Policy and will be addressed within legally prescribed timelines.

privacyPolicy.title: 16. WITHDRAWAL OF CONSENT (GDPR – ARTICLE 7)
privacyPolicy.content:
Where processing is based on consent, data subjects have the right to withdraw consent at any time.

Withdrawal of consent shall not affect the lawfulness of processing carried out prior to such withdrawal.

privacyPolicy.title: 17. CROSS-BORDER DATA TRANSFERS (GDPR – CHAPTER V)
privacyPolicy.content:
To support global operations, personal data may be transferred to and processed in countries outside the EU, including India.

Such transfers are carried out in compliance with Chapter V of the GDPR, using appropriate safeguards such as:
points: contractual protections;
technical and organisational security measures; and
compliance with applicable cross-border data transfer requirements.

privacyPolicy.title: 18. DATA RETENTION & STORAGE LIMITATION (GDPR – ARTICLE 5(1)(e))
privacyPolicy.content: Personal data is retained only for as long as necessary to:
points: fulfil contractual and business purposes;
comply with legal, tax, accounting, and regulatory requirements; and
resolve disputes or enforce agreements.

privacyPolicy.content: Upon expiry of the retention period, data is securely deleted, anonymised, or archived in accordance with applicable law.

privacyPolicy.title: 19. DATA SECURITY & BREACH MANAGEMENT (GDPR – ARTICLES 32, 33 & 34)
privacyPolicy.content:
FirgoMart implements appropriate administrative, technical, and organisational measures to protect personal data against unauthorised access, loss, alteration, or disclosure.

In the event of a personal data breach:
points: reasonable steps shall be taken to assess and contain the breach; and
notifications shall be made to competent authorities and affected users where required under applicable law.

privacyPolicy.title: 20. AUTOMATED DECISION-MAKING & PROFILING
privacyPolicy.content:
FirgoMart does not engage in automated decision-making or profiling that produces legal or similarly significant effects on users, except where permitted under Article 22 of the GDPR and applicable law.

Where such processing occurs, appropriate safeguards shall be implemented.

privacyPolicy.title: 21. OTHER GLOBAL PRIVACY LAWS
privacyPolicy.content: FirgoMart also recognises and respects user rights under other global privacy frameworks, including but not limited to:
points: UK GDPR;
California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA/CPRA);
other applicable international data protection regulations.

privacyPolicy.content: Users may exercise applicable rights in accordance with their local laws.

privacyPolicy.title: 22. PRIVACY CONTACT & GRIEVANCE REDRESSAL
privacyPolicy.content:
For privacy-related queries, data subject requests, or complaints, users may contact:

Email: support@firgomart.com

Requests shall be handled in accordance with applicable law and within prescribed timelines.

privacyPolicy.title: 23. GOVERNING LAW & JURISDICTION
privacyPolicy.content:
This Privacy Policy and this Addendum shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India, together with applicable international data protection laws where relevant.

Courts having jurisdiction over FirgoMart 24Logistics Private Limited shall have exclusive jurisdiction, subject to mandatory rights of data subjects under applicable law.

termsOfService.title: Introduction
termsOfService.content:
These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern the access to and use of the FirgoMart mobile application, website, seller interfaces, administrative systems, APIs, and all related digital platforms and infrastructure (collectively, the "Platform"). The Platform is owned and operated by FirgoMart 24Logistics Private Limited, an Indian Private Limited Company incorporated under the Companies Act, 2013 and having its principal place of business in India ("FirgoMart", "Company", "we", "us", or "our").

FirgoMart is a legally recognised e-commerce operator under applicable Indian laws. FirgoMart operates both as (a) a technology-enabled marketplace facilitating the sale of products by independent third-party sellers, and (b) a direct seller where FirgoMart purchases products from manufacturers, suppliers, or authorised vendors and sells such products in its own name through the Platform within India and internationally.

By accessing, registering on, browsing, or using the Platform in any manner, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, you must not use the Platform.

termsOfService.title: 1. Definitions
termsOfService.content: Company or FirgoMart means FirgoMart 24Logistics Private Limited. User means any individual or legal entity accessing or using the Platform, including buyers, sellers, suppliers, manufacturers, service providers, logistics partners, payment partners, and visitors. Seller means a GST-registered Indian seller, an approved international seller, or FirgoMart acting as a direct seller. International Seller means a seller located outside India approved by FirgoMart to sell on the Platform subject to valid legal and regulatory documentation. Non-GST Indian Supplier means an Indian individual or entity not registered under GST who supplies goods exclusively to FirgoMart and does not sell directly to customers. Buyer means any User purchasing goods through the Platform. Goods means products listed, supplied, or sold through the Platform. Applicable Law means all laws, rules, regulations, notifications, and guidelines in force in India and, where relevant, foreign laws applicable to cross-border transactions.

termsOfService.title: 2. Nature of the Platform
termsOfService.content: FirgoMart provides digital infrastructure to enable the discovery, listing, sale, and distribution of goods. FirgoMart is not an agent, distributor, or partner of third-party sellers. For transactions involving third-party sellers, the respective seller is solely responsible for the sale of goods. Where FirgoMart sells products directly, FirgoMart shall be the seller of record and shall assume responsibility as per Applicable Law.

termsOfService.title: 3. Eligibility and Account Registration
termsOfService.content: Users must be legally competent to enter into binding contracts under Applicable Law. Sellers and suppliers must provide accurate, complete, and up-to-date KYC, tax, banking, and compliance information. FirgoMart reserves the right to approve, reject, suspend, restrict, or terminate any account or listing at its sole discretion, including for non-compliance with law or these Terms.

termsOfService.title: 4. Seller and Supplier Categories
termsOfService.content: The Platform supports the following categories: (a) GST-Registered Indian Sellers permitted to sell directly to customers, (b) International Sellers permitted to sell subject to approval and compliance, (c) Non-GST Indian Suppliers operating under a supply-only model with FirgoMart, and (d) FirgoMart acting as a Direct Seller. Each category operates under a distinct legal and commercial framework.

termsOfService.title: 5. International Sellers
termsOfService.content: International Sellers may sell on the Platform only after prior approval by FirgoMart and submission of valid legal, regulatory, tax, export, and business documentation. International Sellers are solely responsible for compliance with export laws, customs regulations, foreign exchange rules, duties, taxes, and documentation unless FirgoMart expressly acts as the direct seller. FirgoMart reserves the right to approve, reject, suspend, or terminate any International Seller account based on compliance, risk, or regulatory requirements.

termsOfService.title: 6. Non-GST Indian Suppliers – Supply-Only Model
termsOfService.content: Non-GST Indian Suppliers are not permitted to sell products directly to customers on the Platform and shall not be treated as sellers under e-commerce laws. Such suppliers cannot list products in their own name, cannot issue invoices to customers, and cannot sell domestically or internationally. Under this model, products are supplied to FirgoMart, FirgoMart purchases and becomes the legal owner of such products, and FirgoMart sells the products directly to customers in its own name in India and globally.

termsOfService.title: 6.1 Payment to Non-GST Indian Suppliers
termsOfService.content: For products supplied by Non-GST Indian Suppliers and sold by FirgoMart, FirgoMart shall make payment to the supplier within 15 (fifteen) days from the date of successful sale and completion of the applicable return or refund window. Payments shall be made to the supplier’s registered bank account, subject to agreed commercial terms and lawful deductions.

termsOfService.title: 7. GST-Registered Indian Sellers
termsOfService.content: GST-registered sellers may undertake intra-state, inter-state, and international sales in accordance with Applicable Law and are solely responsible for GST compliance, invoicing, tax payments, statutory filings, refunds, replacements, and after-sales obligations.

termsOfService.title: 8. International Sales and Export Compliance
termsOfService.content: For cross-border transactions, third-party sellers and International Sellers are responsible for compliance with the Foreign Trade Policy, Customs Act, FEMA, and RBI guidelines. FirgoMart shall not be deemed the exporter of record for third-party seller transactions. Where FirgoMart sells products directly, FirgoMart shall act as exporter where applicable.

termsOfService.title: 9. Pricing, Payments, and Settlements
termsOfService.content: Prices displayed on the Platform may be inclusive or exclusive of applicable taxes. FirgoMart may facilitate payment collection, settlements, deductions, adjustments, and recoveries. FirgoMart reserves the right to withhold or adjust payments in cases of disputes, fraud, non-compliance, or legal requirements.

termsOfService.title: 10. Platform Rights and Controls
termsOfService.content: FirgoMart reserves the right to monitor Platform activity, review listings, delist products, suspend or terminate accounts, modify Platform features or fees, and take any action necessary to protect legal, regulatory, security, or business interests.

termsOfService.title: 11. User Obligations
termsOfService.content: Users shall not misuse the Platform, violate Applicable Law, engage in fraudulent or misleading conduct, or infringe intellectual property rights.

termsOfService.title: 12. Intellectual Property
termsOfService.content: All intellectual property rights related to the Platform, including trademarks, logos, software, databases, and content, are owned by or licensed to FirgoMart. No rights are granted except as expressly stated in these Terms.

termsOfService.title: 13. Limitation of Liability
termsOfService.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, FirgoMart shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, consequential, or special damages arising from use of the Platform or third-party seller transactions.

termsOfService.title: 14. Indemnity
termsOfService.content: Users, sellers, and suppliers agree to indemnify and hold harmless FirgoMart against any claims, losses, penalties, or liabilities arising from breach of these Terms or violation of Applicable Law.

termsOfService.title: 15. Termination
termsOfService.content: FirgoMart may suspend or terminate access to the Platform at any time for non-compliance, risk management, or legal reasons. Termination does not affect accrued rights or obligations.

termsOfService.title: 16. Force Majeure
termsOfService.content: FirgoMart shall not be liable for failure or delay caused by events beyond reasonable control, including natural disasters, government actions, system failures, or other force majeure events.

termsOfService.title: 17. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
termsOfService.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. Courts having jurisdiction over FirgoMart shall have exclusive jurisdiction.

termsOfService.title: 18. International Orders
termsOfService.content: FirgoMart is operated and managed from India by FirgoMart 24Logistics Private Limited. All international orders placed through the FirgoMart website or mobile application are processed, packed, and shipped directly from India using approved international logistics partners.

termsOfService.title: 19. International Shipping and Customs
termsOfService.content:
International delivery timelines may vary depending on the destination country, customs clearance procedures, regulatory checks, and logistics partner operations. Any delay caused by customs authorities, force majeure events, or circumstances beyond FirgoMart’s reasonable control shall not be treated as a breach of service obligations.

All customs duties, import taxes, VAT, clearance charges, or local levies imposed by the destination country are the sole responsibility of the buyer. FirgoMart does not collect, control, reimburse, or refund such charges.

termsOfService.title: 20. International Returns and Refunds
termsOfService.content:
Orders shipped outside India are treated as final sale and are not eligible for standard returns or exchanges.

Refunds for international orders shall be considered only in cases of damaged, defective, or incorrect products, subject to verification and approval by FirgoMart.

FirgoMart reserves the right to process approved international refunds without requiring physical return of the product to India, depending on the nature of the issue. Customs duties, international shipping fees, and destination country charges are strictly non-refundable in all cases.

Return shipping for international orders will be charged at actual courier cost. Estimated reference range: GCC Countries approx. ₹2,500 per return; USA approx. ₹3,000 per return. Final charge will be as per actual reverse courier cost.

International Cancellation Charges:
- Before Dispatch: Full refund (gateway charges may be deducted if non-refundable).
- After Dispatch: Treated as return. Return shipping cost applicable.

Non-Refundable Components:
- Original shipping charges
- Payment gateway charges
- Customs duty (if applicable)

termsOfService.title: 21. Import Restrictions and Buyer Responsibility
termsOfService.content:
Buyers are solely responsible for ensuring that products ordered through the Platform comply with the import laws, regulations, and restrictions of the destination country.

If an order is rejected, delayed, returned, seized, confiscated, or destroyed by customs or regulatory authorities due to prohibited items, documentation issues, or non-compliance with import regulations, FirgoMart shall not be liable for any refunds, replacements, or compensation.

termsOfService.title: 22. Payments, Currency, and Cash on Delivery
termsOfService.content:
Cash on Delivery (COD) is available only for orders shipped within India. All international orders must be prepaid using supported online payment methods.

Prices for international orders may be displayed in local currency or converted from Indian Rupees (INR) based on prevailing exchange rates. Any currency conversion fees, international transaction charges, or bank fees are determined solely by the payment service provider or issuing bank.

Refunds for prepaid orders are processed only to the original payment method. International refunds may take additional time due to banking procedures, foreign exchange regulations, and cross-border settlement processes.

cookiesPolicy.title: Cookie Policy – FirgoMart
cookiesPolicy.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how FirgoMart, operated by FirgoMart 24Logistics Private Limited, an Indian Private Limited Company incorporated under the Companies Act, 2013 ("Company", "FirgoMart", "we", "us", or "our"), uses cookies and similar technologies on the FirgoMart mobile application, website, seller panels, administrative systems, APIs, and all related digital platforms (collectively, the "Platform"). FirgoMart is a legally recognised E-commerce Operator under applicable Indian laws and operates the Platform for domestic and global users, including buyers, sellers, manufacturers, and partners. By accessing or using the Platform, you consent to the use of cookies and similar technologies in accordance with this Cookie Policy, the Privacy Policy, and applicable law.

cookiesPolicy.title: 1. What Are Cookies
cookiesPolicy.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device (computer, mobile phone, tablet, or other internet-enabled device) when you visit a website or use an application. Cookies help recognise your device, store preferences, enable core functionality, and improve user experience. Cookies may be session cookies (which expire when you close your browser or app) or persistent cookies (which remain stored on your device for a defined period or until deleted).

cookiesPolicy.title: 2. Types of Cookies Used by FirgoMart

subSections.title: 2.1 Strictly Necessary Cookies
subSections.content: These cookies are essential for the operation of the Platform. They enable basic functions such as:
points: Account login and authentication
Security and fraud prevention
Shopping cart functionality
Payment processing
Without these cookies, the Platform may not function properly

subSections.title: 2.2 Functional Cookies
subSections.content: Functional cookies allow the Platform to remember:
points: User preferences
Language selections
Region or location settings
Other personal customisations that enhance user experience

subSections.title: 2.3 Performance and Analytics Cookies
subSections.content: These cookies collect information such as:
points: Pages visited
Time spent on the Platform
Error reports
Navigation patterns
Data is aggregated and used to analyse performance and improve Platform functionality

subSections.title: 2.4 Advertising and Marketing Cookies
subSections.content: Advertising cookies may be used to:
points: Display relevant advertisements
Measure marketing campaign effectiveness
Limit repetitive ads
Personalise promotional content across platforms

subSections.title: 2.5 Security and Fraud Prevention Cookies
points: Detect suspicious activity
Protect user accounts
Prevent unauthorised access
Enhance overall Platform security

cookiesPolicy.title: 3. Similar Technologies
cookiesPolicy.content: In addition to cookies, FirgoMart may use pixels, web beacons, software development kits (SDKs), local storage, and device identifiers to collect and process information for similar purposes as described in this Policy.

cookiesPolicy.title: 4. Purpose of Using Cookies
points: Enable core Platform functionality and secure access
Authenticate users and manage sessions
Process orders and payments
Analyse usage patterns and improve services
Prevent fraud, misuse, and unauthorised access
Personalise user experience and content
Support marketing, promotions, and communications
Comply with legal and regulatory obligations

cookiesPolicy.title: 5. Third-Party Cookies
cookiesPolicy.content: Some cookies may be placed by third-party service providers such as analytics providers, payment partners, advertising networks, logistics partners, and technology vendors. These third parties may use cookies in accordance with their own privacy and cookie policies. FirgoMart does not control the use of such third-party cookies.

cookiesPolicy.title: 6. International Users and Cross-Border Operations
cookiesPolicy.content: As FirgoMart operates globally, cookies and related data may be processed or stored outside India. Such processing shall be carried out with reasonable safeguards and in compliance with applicable data protection and privacy laws.

cookiesPolicy.title: 7. Cookie Management and User Choices
points: Users may manage or disable cookies through browser settings
Users may manage cookies through mobile device settings
Where required by law, cookie consent or preference tools may be provided
Disabling certain cookies may affect functionality, security, and performance of the Platform

cookiesPolicy.title: 8. Data Protection and Privacy
cookiesPolicy.content: Information collected through cookies may include personal data. Such information is processed in accordance with FirgoMart’s Privacy Policy and applicable laws. Cookies do not typically contain information that directly identifies users, but may be linked to personal data held by FirgoMart.

cookiesPolicy.title: 9. Updates to This Cookie Policy
cookiesPolicy.content: FirgoMart may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in technology, law, or business practices. Any changes shall be effective upon publication on the Platform. Continued use of the Platform constitutes acceptance of the updated Policy.

cookiesPolicy.title: 10. Legal Basis for Using Cookies (GDPR – Article 6)
cookiesPolicy.content: FirgoMart cookies and similar technologies are used and processed in accordance with Article 6 of the General Data Protection Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (“GDPR”) on one or more of the following lawful bases:
points: User consent, where required under applicable law
Performance of a contract, including secure access, order processing, and service delivery
Compliance with legal and regulatory obligations
Legitimate interests of FirgoMart, including platform security, fraud prevention, analytics, and service improvement

cookiesPolicy.title: 11. Cookie Consent and User Control (GDPR – Article 7)
cookiesPolicy.content: Where required by law, FirgoMart obtains valid and informed user consent before placing non-essential cookies. Users may:
points: Manage or withdraw cookie consent at any time through browser or device settings
Use available cookie preference or consent tools, where provided

cookiesPolicy.content: Withdrawal of consent shall not affect the lawfulness of processing carried out prior to such withdrawal. Disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality, performance, or security of the Platform.

cookiesPolicy.title: 12. Data Retention for Cookies
cookiesPolicy.content: Cookies are retained only for the period necessary to achieve their intended purpose:
points: Session cookies are deleted automatically when the browser or application session ends
Persistent cookies remain stored on the user’s device for a defined period or until manually deleted

cookiesPolicy.content: Retention practices are aligned with the storage limitation principle under Article 5(1)(e) of the GDPR.

cookiesPolicy.title: 13. International Data Transfers (GDPR – Chapter V)
cookiesPolicy.content: As FirgoMart operates globally, information collected through cookies may be transferred to, processed, or stored in jurisdictions outside India or the European Union. Such transfers are conducted in accordance with Chapter V of the GDPR, using appropriate safeguards including contractual, technical, and organisational measures, and in compliance with applicable data protection laws.

cookiesPolicy.title: 14. User Rights Under GDPR and Other Global Laws
cookiesPolicy.content: Users located in the European Union, European Economic Area, United Kingdom, and other jurisdictions with similar data protection laws have rights relating to their personal data, including the right to:
points: Access personal data
Restrict or object to certain processing activities
Request deletion or erasure of data, subject to applicable law

cookiesPolicy.content: These rights may be exercised in accordance with FirgoMart’s Privacy Policy and applicable legal requirements.

cookiesPolicy.title: 15. Contact Information
cookiesPolicy.content:
For questions, concerns, or requests relating to this Cookie Policy or the use of cookies, users may contact:

Email: support@firgomart.com

cookiesPolicy.title: 16. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
cookiesPolicy.content: This Cookie Policy shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India, together with applicable international data protection laws, including the GDPR where relevant. Courts having jurisdiction over FirgoMart 24Logistics Private Limited shall have exclusive jurisdiction, subject to mandatory rights of users under applicable law.
